insert into area_pat_rec
patAccCount,
finishAccCount, createTime,
startTime,
plId,
paId,
ptId,
lprId,
finish
values
#{patAccCount},
0, now(),
#{startTime},
#{plId},
#{paId},
#{ptId},
#{lprId},
0
mapper.select: select count(*) from area_pat_rec where paId=#{paId} and ptId=#{ptId} and date_format(createTime,'%Y-%m-%d')=date_format(now(),'%Y-%m-%d')
select id from area_pat_rec where paId=#{paId} and ptId=#{ptId} and date_format(createTime,'%Y-%m-%d')=date_format(now(),'%Y-%m-%d')
mapper.update: update area_pat_rec set finishAccCount=finishAccCount+1 where id=#{id}
update area_pat_rec set endTime=now(),finish=1 where id=#{id}
mapper.select: select count(*) count,apr.finish from patrol_plan pp,pat_line_area_acc_set plaas,area_pat_rec apr where CONCAT(',',pp.plIds,',') like CONCAT('%,',plaas.plId,',%') and plaas.plId=apr.plId and pp.startDate between DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 7 DAY) and current_date() and pp.ptId=#{ptId} group by apr.finish

select pa.name paName,sum(finishAccCount)/sum(patAccCount)*100 finishPercent from area_pat_rec apr,patrol_area pa where apr.paId=pa.id and apr.createTime between DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 7 DAY) and current_date() and ptId=#{ptId} GROUP BY pa.name
